com.clarionmedia.infinitum.aop.impl
Class DelegatingAdvisedProxyFactory

java.lang.Object
  com.clarionmedia.infinitum.aop.impl.DelegatingAdvisedProxyFactory
All Implemented Interfaces:
AdvisedProxyFactory
public class DelegatingAdvisedProxyFactory
extends java.lang.Object
implements AdvisedProxyFactory

AdvisedProxyFactory which creates AopProxy instances by determining the best implementation to use. DelegatingAdvisedProxyFactory will use AdvisedDexMakerProxy to proxy non-final classes and AdvisedJdkDynamicProxy to proxy interfaces.

Since:
1.0
Version:
1.0 07/14/12
Author:
Tyler Treat
